16.1.hd_quote: The expression of talent through daydreaming.
16.1.behavioral_axis: Imagines skills vividly; builds internal patterns before the motor arrives.
16.1.shadow_axis: Claims as fact what’s only envisioned; overpromises.

16.2.hd_quote: Self-reliance and the skill to judge objectively any claim regardless of rhetoric.
16.2.behavioral_axis: Filters ideas for feasibility; guards the pattern from hype.
16.2.shadow_axis: Default ‘no’; demotivates allies with harsh critiques.

16.3.behavioral_axis: Holds skills steady; learns correct timing by experimentation.
16.3.shadow_axis: Overconfidence; relies on others to re-hype after deflation.

16.4.hd_quote: Genuine and sincere support and recognition of others.
16.4.behavioral_axis: Identifies energy bearers; organizes talent toward shared goals.

16.5.hd_quote: The refusal to share in enthusiasm.
16.5.behavioral_axis: Holds back expression until encouragement and timing align.

16.6.hd_quote: The ability to experience, examine and then reject misleading enthusiasm.
16.6.behavioral_axis: Tests many styles; commits only to patterns that endure.
16.6.shadow_axis: Perpetual critic; withholds talent from worthy projects.
